location1: ['Al Barsha South 3Dubai, Al Barsha, Al Barsha South']
amenities:
['Furnished
Balcony
Built in Wardrobes
Covered Parking
Maids Room
Security
Shared Gym']
descriptions:
['Description2020 Marquis is a 9-storey neoteric residential space located in the heart of Dubai at Arjan, providing an ease of access to important destinations around the city. Sporting 1 and 2-bedroom apartments, this functional and homely living space is designed to encourage community and interaction.
2020 Marquis is an aesthetically driven property focused towards the next generation of home-owners. This ethereal residential space with exclusive amenities, coupled with it’s connectivity, makes it très magnifique for home owners who are expanding their horizons.
2020 holdings has launched their first project in ARJAN, Dubai, near Miracle Garden with the G+8 floor, on Thursday, 10th May 2018. The groundbreaking ceremony was inaugurated by M.A. Yusuff Ali, Chairman and Managing Director, Lulu International Group at 11:30 am in the presence of Dr Mohamed Ali Galfar, Mr P.V Abdul Wahab MP, DR Azad Moopan, Mr Shamsudeen Mohiyudeen, Dr Ibrahim Haji, Mr Jumah Khalifa – Director of Dubai municipality, Mr Mohamed Hassan Foolad, Mr Ali Mohammed Al Shihie, Mr Ashraf Ali MA, Mr Saifu – CEO of LuLu group and Mr Adeeb Ahmed – MD of Lulu exchange.
The welcome speech was done by Dr Mohammed Kasim Paliathazhathu followed by a project description by Engineer Shameer Kasim – Partner at 2020 holding and MD, Skybay Real Estate. The stage ceremony was supported by partners in 2020 holding, Mr PB Navas Khan and Eng. Mohammed Mezuk while Panakkad Syed Sadiq Ali Shihab Thangal conducted the Dua ceremony.
Mr Shamlal Ahmed – Malabar Gold, Mr Siddique ITL, Mr Shibu Baby John – Ex-Labour Minister, Govt of Kerala, Mr KM Mohammed – KM Trading, Mr Abdul Salaam – Malabar Gold and many more dignitaries were also present at the ceremony. The Programme ended with a tour of the showhouse created at the venue followed by lunch.']

['DescriptionThe Property 
This 1 Bed with balcony in Bab Al Bahr is located in Al Marjan Island, Ras Al Khaimah With view over the beach and nearby to facilities such as spacious parking, swimming pool, and beach access. 
The kitchen is fitted. 
The total area is 1,670.00 sq. ft. including the balcony. 
Basement parking is available for one car. 
It is offered for sale furnished. 
Al Marjan Island is an artificial archipelago in the Persian Gulf, consisting of four alluvial islands, located in the Emirate of Ras Al Khaimah. The residential complex Bab Al Bahr is one of the best residential complexes on the islands. There is a private beach, swimming pool, supermarket, pharmacy and parking. All this is at the service of residents and guests. The Bab Al Bahr is located between the hotels Rixos - Bab Al Bahr and Double Three by Hilton.
Bab Al Bahr is a freehold area. 
GEMS Westminster School, International School of Choueifat, Ras Al Khaimah Academy and Ras Al Khaimah American School are the nearby schools. 
RAK Hospital and Sheikh Khalifa Specialist Hospital are the hospitals within the area 
The nearest shopping mall is Al Hamra Mall. 
Extending 4.5 kilometers into the Arabian Gulf
Located just 45 minutes from Dubai
Viewing by appointment
Owners list your properties with us
Call Azalea Real Estate on M: : +971509996299 or visit us for further details.']

descriptions:
['DescriptionWater’s Edge is ideally situated on its own canal and 800m promenade, in the heart of Yas Island. From modern studios to spacious three bedroom apartments, every home brings you the best of Yas at affordable prices, with beautiful views over the canal and beyond.
The destination will feature landscaped gardens, fully equipped gyms, pools and a jogging track that skirts the canal. Residents can also enjoy a waterfront boardwalk lined with cafes, restaurants and shops.
At Water’s Edge, everything moves at your own pace. So for those who enjoy action, the jogging and cycling trails, sport pitches and pools are ideal for getting your heart pumping. While the waterfront promenade brings a relaxed taste of the Med with its stylish selection of shops and restaurants.
About the developer
Aldar Properties PJSC is the leading real estate developer in Abu Dhabi, and through its iconic developments, it is one of the most well known in the United Arab Emirates, and the wider Middle East region. From its beginnings in 2005 through to today, Aldar continues to shape and enhance the urban fabric of the UAE’s Capital City in addition to other key areas of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi.']

descriptions:
["DescriptionAX Capital is proud to offer this Luxurious 3 Bedroom penthouse with maids room in the beautiful sea-side vicinity of the Palm Jumeirah.
Below are features and amenities:
* SPA
* Lounge, for Ladies and Gents
* Children Areas
*  Beach
*  Security
* Gated Community with private access to the owners and their guests only
* VIP Treatment at the W-The Palm
* Personal Concierge Service
* Valet Parking Service
The Alef Residences comprises 104 homes located in eight Mansions, each featuring their own dedicated lobbies and private lifts. Reside in one of the Mansion's unique living spaces, a penthouse with up to three levels, or own an entire Mansion, all serviced by W -The Palm. The Alef Residences, every home features a gourmet kitchen, designed to be either open, double up as a bar, or be totally closed off and separate from the rest of the living space. All are fitted with Poggenpohl furnishings and state-of-the-art Miele appliances with a service kitchen at the back of the property for entertaining and daily use. 
The Alef Residences on Palm Jumeirah, is the first chapter in a story of passion for better, that will be told across the Middle East and beyond. Just like the standard of original and authentic luxury living the name represents, boundaries are always being pushed.
For more information, Please contact our Specialist on +971561123456"]
